segments.text: Observing this kitchen, the layout is straightforward with counters and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is facing away, tending to a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, wetting the front of the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the tile floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the upper cabinet is open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on the two-step stool, extending his reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, her palm open toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink frames a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back to let in the daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, the stool legs are splayed unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR
